```{r setup}
library(mrt.dose)
```

# Simulate some data
```{r}
df.corr <- simMhealth(m=100, n=37, time=5, days=42,
                      eta=1, rho=0.5,
                      theta1=1, theta2=0.8,
                      beta10=0.5, beta11=0, beta12=0.2,
                      p=0.5)
debugonce(get.sim.rslts)
rslt <- get.sim.rslts(m=100, dfs=df.corr, dose=1, print_progress=TRUE)

```
